articles.title: Big vote on Tuesday in Europe could determine the future of the Lightning port on iPhone - PhoneArena
articles.description: By next week, when voting ends on June 7th in Europe, we should know whether Apple will need to replace the Lightning port with USB-C in Europe at least.
